task.title: Viewing certificate profiles by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view certificate profiles by using the list CertificateProfile, and show CertificateProfile commands on the command line.

context.p: You can view certificate profiles by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to view certificate profiles, see .

step.cmd: To view all certificate profiles, enter the following command:
To view a specific certificate profile, enter the following command:
step.info:
show CertificateProfile "Name=name"Where:
name Specifies the name of the certificate profile that you want to view.
